summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4912 for the improvement of the alley in block 12, replat of J.J. McGilvra's 3rd Addition, being the alley between 42nd Avenue North and 42rd Avenue North, from East Garfield Street to East Blaine Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 56273 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
